title: LF DUO or Team - Climb to Silver I
body:
Hello League peeps,

Looking for a decent players to get rid of the solo-q newbs and climb some actual rating.

I have 2 mates who want to climb as well.

Add me, I'm on every night. 

Positions I know well: JG, ADC, TOP

Positions wanted: ALL

Enquire within.

Discord or Skype is a must.
